name: Shadows (itch) (fedz, Crompwell, lpancho)
description:
Shadows is a horror/terror game that plays around the anticipation and constant fear of something following you. Solve all the puzzles to escape and don't get caught.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • F for flashlight
  • SHIFT for sprint
  • ESC to make mouse cursor visible / interact with puzzle

Music & sounds by sparkofthewest

Good luck and have fun!
